messages.msgSnippet: Hi, my name is Angel. I m new to the group. I need information about Yoshida Chuzeemon, a Samurai under Oishi Kuranosuke, from the famous 47 Retainers (1701).
messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Angel.
I'm new to the group.
I need information about Yoshida Chuzeemon, a Samurai under Oishi Kuranosuke, from the famous 47 Retainers (1701).
Need to know where to look, for information in his person, what type of fencing style he was a master, since he was a very skilful swordsman.
Also any information in his sword made by Fujihara Yoshitake.

Thank you!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
